title: Official Release – ISDRC 2025 Abstract Book
summary: Abstract Book for the ISDRC Seminar 2025 is published (soft copy available).
content:
The detailed Abstract Book for the ISDRC Seminar 2025 has been published.
The soft copy of the book is available from the download link.

title: Call for Abstracts – National Seminar 2025
summary: Submit one-page abstracts for the National Seminar by 10 June 2025.
content:
The Innovation and Skill Development Research Centre (ISDRC), Department of Physics, Jadavpur University, invites one-page abstracts for inclusion in the Abstract Book of the National Seminar held on 7th March 2025.
Submit your abstract by 10th June 2025 to isdrcjuphys@gmail.com.

title: National Seminar Website & Program Schedule
summary: Official seminar website and program schedule are now available online.
content:
We are pleased to announce the official website for the upcoming One-Day National Seminar organized by the ISDRC, Department of Physics, Jadavpur University.
Participants can access important updates, program schedule, and session details online.

title: One-Day National Seminar – 7th March 2025
summary: One-day national seminar on Scientific Innovation and Skill Development for Societal Advancement.
content:
ISDRC is organizing a one-day national seminar on 7th March 2025 named Scientific Innovation and Skill Development for Societal Advancement at the Dr. K.P. Basu Memorial Hall, Engineering Science Building, Jadavpur University, Kolkata.
Faculty, researchers, students, and professionals from all fields are invited to participate.
